title: Airbus Bests Boeing  By Enforcing Deals  --- -2-
text: In addition to taking the 16 unwanted planes last year, Lufthansa agreed in April to take 12 new planes this year, while deferring delivery of an additional 24 jets in later years. Lufthansa agreed to pay penalties for the contract changes. It also agreed to buy an additional five A350 wide-bodies for delivery in 2027.
